messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/24/2005 7:18:00 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Elissa, do you know of any good knitting or
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/24/2005 7:18:00 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Elissa, do you know of any good knitting or spinning -- or fiber arts
in general -- e-lists? I checked out some from yahoo, but they were
not very good -- no one ever posted anything except notices of stuff
they were selling : (.
**************
I don't but I can ask around. I'll save your email addy and send them to you
off list.
I think there are message baoards at Knitting101, try theere.

Elissa
Mystik Hill Farm
Kearneysville, WV
